reason: The `#rerun_argument` method has been deprecated in favor of `#location_rerun_argument` for better clarity and distinction between rerun arguments based on location and example ID.

This API exhibited complex behavior. Instead, the TTY mechanism for color display has become the preferred method, or users are encouraged to set #color_mode to ':on' for enabling color output on non-TTY environments.
Streamlined usage, merged functionality into FailedExampleNotification for better maintainability
PendingExampleFixedNotification is deprecated. Developers should use FailedExampleNotification to handle similar functionality.
The semantics of `RSpec::Core::Pending#pending` changed to allow the rest of the example to run and fail if applicable, marking the example as a failure instead of pending if the code passes.

Deprecation warning for requiring `rspec/autorun` in scenarios where RSpec is invoked via the `rspec` command. This may not align with standard practices and alternative methods are encouraged for running tests using RSpec.
